content.raw: Works well for me!  I left a few comments.  One thing that we could also think about is preferencing degrees over radians for the RPY inputs, we went this direction for the snap RPY values as they are more user intuitive so I think it might be better to stay consistent across plugins, but I could see the use case for both rads and degrees.
content.html: Works well for me! I left a few comments. One thing that we could also think about is preferencing degrees over radians for the RPY inputs, we went this direction for the snap RPY values as they are more user intuitive so I think it might be better to stay consistent across plugins, but I could see the use case for both rads and degrees.
